title: N172 Old Judge King Kelly Portait SGC 20
author: canjond

posts.post_title: N172 Old Judge King Kelly Portait SGC 20
posts.post_content:
Solid lower condition N172 King Kelly - all in all, an affordable version of a classic!  Looking for $[STRIKE]1500 [/STRIKE] $1325 (shipped) PP FF.
